page.title: 09Daily life of a 10 year old.
page.content:
Nerys Morris, aged 10.
I get up at 8 a.m., have breakfast of toast and jam, and then my mother drives me to school, arriving at about 8:45. I play with my friend Joanne, until the bell goes at 9:00 a.m. We all go into the hall for assembly, and then during the morning we do reading, mathematics, Welsh and English. We have playtime at 10:30. The bell goes for lunch at 12:00 and I stay in school and have a school dinner. In the afternoon we sometimes have science, spelling, interest, swimming or games. We have playtime at 2:20 and we go home at 3:30. I change my clothes and go out to play for a while. I have tea, watch TV and do my homework, then I have supper and go to bed at 9:00 p.m.
